pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the President of Colombia, Iv치n Duque M치rquez | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Trudeau spoke yesterday with Colombian President Iv치n Duque M치rquez.

President Duque congratulated Prime Minister Trudeau on his re-election.

The Prime Minister and the President spoke about the strong partnership between their countries on key regional priorities.

The two leaders reaffirmed their commitment to ongoing close cooperation.
